summary: Water quality is stable but requires monitoring due to slight deviations from average parameters.

insights.recommendation: Maintain pH between 6.5 and 7.5; monitor closely.
Consider water changes if TDS continues to rise above 350 ppm.
Ensure temperature remains between 24-28°C for optimal growth.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.037 / 7.009 / 7.106 (trend: down)
• TDS avg/min/max: 328.296 / 307.8 / 338.0 ppm (trend: up)
• Temp avg/min/max: 25.656 / 23.44 / 29.62 °C (trend: down)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
